author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
How do you protect a horse in battle while respecting its need for comfort and agility? At @metmuseum, assistant curator Marina Viallon takes Adam Savage through some EXTRAORDINARY examples of horse armor, including headpieces that cover the horse's eyes and ears entirely! 

The MET's Arms and Armor Department: https://www.metmuseum.org/about-the-met/collection-areas/arms-and-armor
The Met Museum: https://www.metmuseum.org/
Playlist of our  @metmuseum  videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLJtitKU0CAeiUv8endzt93QO2_T96n_xe
Adam Savage Tours Samurai Helmets! https://youtu.be/aX023WWlH_A
Amazing (and REAL) Medieval Full-Face Helmets! https://youtu.be/yS3TtXkhnjQ
Adam Savage Tours Medieval Crossbows: https://youtu.be/zretcxDkU1I

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: All About Medieval HORSE Armor! (at @metmuseum)
